2010 achievement: Riding Do n't Push It to win the 2010 Grand National at the 15th attempt , having won more races than any jump jockey in history

Becoming the World Darts Champion for a record 15th time by winning the 2010 PDC tournament in January 2010 , doing a double 9-Dart Finish in the 2010 PDC Premier League Darts and winning a further six major titles during the year
Winning the gold medal for the Women 's Heptathlon at the 2010 European Athletics Championships in Barcelona , Spain
Becoming the new World Number One male golfer after a successful 2010 season , replacing the long time leader Tiger Woods
Becoming the first European winner of the U.S. Open since 1970 , scoring 284 at the 2010 tournament at Pebble Beach , California
Winning two gold medals for the Men 's Diving ( 10 metre platform , team and individual ) at the 2010 Commonwealth Games in Delhi , India
Winning five stages of the Tour de France , followed by taking 3 stages and the Points Jersey in the Vuelta a Espa√±a
Winning the Gold Medal for the Women 's Skeleton at the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver , Canada , the first British individual winter gold medal in 30 years
For his spin bowling for England against Bangladesh ( May to June ) and Pakistan ( July to September ) , and in the 2010 ICC World Twenty20 competition
Making two successful defences of his WBA World Heavyweight Championship belt , against John Ruiz on 3 April , and Audley Harrison on 13 November
